about_the_game:
INCEL SIMULATOR is a card game in which you make decisions that determine the future of the protagonist. To do this, simply swipe the card left or right.

You are Alex Dysfuctional and you have never had a girlfriend. Despite your best efforts. It seems that the world itself is designed to cause unbearable pain. However, maybe it's not too late to change everything? The only question is what is closer to you - to try again and again to pump up your body and spirit or to become the king of incels?

Heavy drama about the fate of one man.


You'll follow a difficult story of Alexei at the turning point of life. Together with Alexei find again the meaning in this cruel and ruthless world. Find the true purpose of your existence.

Cards, cards, cards


Gameplay is designed in card style, which gives it a special dynamics.

Choices and consequences


Make a lot of fateful decisions that will greatly change Alexei's life. It depends only on you how the protagonist will change - whether he will go to the gym, go on dates or finally forget about everything and lock himself in his apartment. Your choices will lead you to one of three endings.

Key features:
1. Non-linear story with multiple choices.
2. Simple and intuitive controls. In order to make a choice in the game you just need to swipe the card left or right.
3. Depending on your choices, the story can end with three different endings.
4. Tragicomedy about the hard life of one incel.

content_descriptors.notes: Crude language(strongest), sexual themes, forced sexual intercourse (in text dialogues), sex-related language

name: INCEL SIMULATOR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.5 GHz / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / RX 480 (4GB+ of VRAM)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.5 GHz / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / RX 480 (4GB+ of VRAM)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: You are Alex Dysfuctional and you have never had a girlfriend. But maybe it's not too late to change things. The only question is what is closer to you - to try again and again to pump up your body and spirit or to become the king of the incels? Make life-changing decisions and change Alex's life.
